full_threads.body: @joel can you please tackle this one? Thanks

Hey Heath,

We have decided to not proceed with using Calendly as we don’t think there’s currently a need for this.

Instead – let’s roll out the current ‘Request a live demo’ button as per the below – we would just like to add an extra an Field for the form that says ‘Country’ and change the ‘Your message’ field to say ‘Your message, including your preferred date(s) and time(s)’ (or else add ‘preferred date(s) and time(s)’ as a separate field)

Happy to roll this out across all of our products on AU and GLOBAL sites! Thanks






Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310
Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000
acoufelt.com <http://www.acoufelt.com/>

full_threads.body:
Hi Lucy, 

Confirming we have updated the button as below: https://acoufelt.com/product/colourways/

Regarding the calendar... It's pretty straight forward. You would need to:

  1. Setup an account at calendly.com
  2. Connect one of your email accounts that the calendar will be managed in
  3. Send me the logins for calendy and I'll integrate with the site

Let me know if you need a hand with this?

Heath,

Had a chat with Ben today about the request a live demo function – he agreed with points about having too many calls to action.

Instead we’d like to update the ‘talk to an acoustic expert’ button to ‘request a live demo’.

Do you think we should also move it up the page ? My thoughts were maybe moving up to here where there’s a lot of white space but be good to hear your thoughts!

I also like the idea of having the calendar function attached to this so they can easily choose the date and time – will this require a lot of work to get this uploaded? Otherwise in meantime a simple form should suffice.

Will keep the ‘Chat now’ Olark function as is for timebeing.

Thanks heath!



Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310
Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000
acoufelt.com <http://www.acoufelt.com/>
